endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: mask

param_schema.title: Mask
param_schema.description: Input mask for inpaint mode. Black areas will be preserved, white areas will be inpainted.

parameters.description: Input mask for inpaint mode. Black areas will be preserved, white areas will be inpainted.

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.name: image

param_schema.title: Image
param_schema.description: Input image for img2img or inpaint mode

parameters.description: Input image for img2img or inpaint mode

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.default: An astronaut riding a rainbow unicorn

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.default: An astronaut riding a rainbow unicorn

parameters.name: lora_scale

param_schema.title: Lora Scale
param_schema.description: LoRA additive scale. Only applicable on trained models.

parameters.description: LoRA additive scale. Only applicable on trained models.

parameters.name: lora_weights

param_schema.title: Lora Weights
param_schema.description: Replicate LoRA weights to use. Leave blank to use the default weights.

parameters.description: Replicate LoRA weights to use. Leave blank to use the default weights.

parameters.name: refine_steps

param_schema.title: Refine Steps
param_schema.description: For base_image_refiner, the number of steps to refine, defaults to num_inference_steps

parameters.description: For base_image_refiner, the number of steps to refine, defaults to num_inference_steps

parameters.name: apply_watermark

param_schema.title: Apply Watermark
param_schema.description: Applies a watermark to enable determining if an image is generated in downstream applications. If you have other provisions for generating or deploying images safely, you can use this to disable watermarking.

parameters.description: Applies a watermark to enable determining if an image is generated in downstream applications. If you have other provisions for generating or deploying images safely, you can use this to disable watermarking.

parameters.name: prompt_strength

param_schema.title: Prompt Strength
param_schema.description: Prompt strength when using img2img / inpaint. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of information in image

parameters.description: Prompt strength when using img2img / inpaint. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of information in image

parameters.name: sizing_strategy

param_schema.description: Decide how to resize images – use width/height, resize based on input image or control image

parameters.description: Decide how to resize images – use width/height, resize based on input image or control image

parameters.name: disable_safety_checker

param_schema.title: Disable Safety Checker
param_schema.description: Disable safety checker for generated images. This feature is only available through the API. See [https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety](https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety)

parameters.description: Disable safety checker for generated images. This feature is only available through the API. See [https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety](https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety)

parameters.name: controlnet_1_conditioning_scale

param_schema.title: Controlnet 1 Conditioning Scale
param_schema.description: How strong the controlnet conditioning is

parameters.description: How strong the controlnet conditioning is

parameters.name: controlnet_2_conditioning_scale

param_schema.title: Controlnet 2 Conditioning Scale
param_schema.description: How strong the controlnet conditioning is

parameters.description: How strong the controlnet conditioning is

parameters.name: controlnet_3_conditioning_scale

param_schema.title: Controlnet 3 Conditioning Scale
param_schema.description: How strong the controlnet conditioning is

parameters.description: How strong the controlnet conditioning is
